name: Interdimensional Delivery Inc
description:
What

You. Are. Broke.  But, you just got a new job! You are making deliveries at Interdimensional Delivery Inc.

Get those bucks by making some risky deliveries or by picking up packages throughout the multidimensional warp.

Play with your friends in this twin stick delivery shooter, local co-op up to 3 players. Collaborate, survive creatures and deliver some packages. 

How
  • Requires a game pad.
  • Plug in one or two more game pads to play with your friends.
  • Press "start" button to pause the game and see the button layout.
